<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A record for a potential prefetch made during the initial scan of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop. This is used to let a single prefetch target multiple memory accesses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/prefetch"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#ada4ee98e266564177ed0ddb2d1d13ee7">Prefetch</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The address formula for this prefetch as returned by ScalarEvolution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#abe7627ac85b04e66883d05bf27f2e2cf"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#abe7627ac85b04e66883d05bf27f2e2cf">LSCEVAddRec</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The point of insertion for the prefetch instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#a5374d9e6077e58aa5b386cff17137285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/prefetch/#a5374d9e6077e58aa5b386cff17137285">InsertPt</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// True if targeting a write memory access.</span></CodeLine>
